SEARCH
Package ru.introguzzle.parsers.common.mapping.deserialization

Interface TypeResolver

public interface TypeResolver
Interface defining methods for handling generic types.

This interface provides methods for:

  • Resolving field types against the raw class, considering generics.
  • Converting types to their raw Class representation.
  • Retrieving component types for arrays or collections.

Implementations of this interface are used to support working with types that might contain generics, such as collections (e.g., List or Map).

See Also:
  • TypeToken

  • Method Details

    • getFieldAccessor

      FieldAccessor getFieldAccessor()
      Gets the FieldAccessor used to retrieve fields from classes.
      Returns:
      the FieldAccessor that provides access to class fields.

    • resolveTypes

      Map<String,Type> resolveTypes(Class<?> rawType, Type type)
      Resolves the actual types for fields in a class, considering generics.

      For example, for a type like Map<String, Integer>, this method would return a map where:

      • The key type would be String,
      • The value type would be Integer.
      Parameters:
      rawType - the raw (non-generic) class type (e.g., Map).
      type - the type with full information, including generics, obtained from TypeToken.
      Returns:
      a map where the keys are field names and the values are their resolved types.
      See Also:
      • TypeToken

    • getRawType

      Class<?> getRawType(Type type)
      Converts a type into its raw Class representation.

      For example, if the input type is List<String>, the method would return List.class.

      Parameters:
      type - the type, which may contain generic parameters.
      Returns:
      the raw class representation of the type (i.e., the class without generics).

    • getComponentType

      Class<?> getComponentType(@NotNull @NotNull Type type)
      Extracts the component type from the given type.

      For example, for the type List<String>, this method would return String.class. If the type is not an array, this method returns null.

      Parameters:
      type - the type from which to extract the component type.
      Returns:
      the component type if the type is an array, otherwise null.

    • newResolver

      @NotNull static @NotNull TypeResolver newResolver(@NotNull @NotNull FieldAccessor fieldAccessor)
      Creates a new instance of TypeResolver.
      Parameters:
      fieldAccessor - the FieldAccessor used for retrieving fields from classes.
      Returns:
      a new implementation of TypeResolver.
